soldiers.name: Earth Elf Knight
soldiers.effect: Crit increased by 10%(→30%). Upon landing a critical hit, steals 1 buff from the enemy and applies 1 strong debuff.

trainingSkill.name: Earth Elf Knight
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Soldier Crit +Y%. Upon landing a critical hit, steals 1 buff from the enemy and applies 1 strong debuff.

Prereqs: Archer & Assassin Training Level 12, Anti-Mage Specialization Level 1

soldiers.name: Night Elf
soldiers.effect: Soldier ATK and Critical Hit Rate +15%. When actively attacking, soldier's critical hit rate and critical damage +15%; if this occurswhile this unit is in a Forest, then this unit will attack first.

soldiers.name: Holy
soldiers.effect: Basic Holy unit. Normal attacks deal [MDamage].

soldiers.name: Inquisitor
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero healing effects increased by 2%(→10%).

trainingSkill.name: Inquisitor
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. When attacking, damage is reduced by Y%.

Prereq: Basic DEF Level 5

soldiers.name: Monk
soldiers.effect: When battling against Demons, ATK increases by 20%(→30%).

trainingSkill.name: Monk
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. When battling against [Demons], ATK increases by Y%.

Prereq: Advanced Survival Level 5

soldiers.name: Bishop
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero healing effects increased by 5%(→15%). When Soldier HP > 80%, DEF increases by 10%(→30%).

trainingSkill.name: Bishop
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero Healing Effects +Y%. When Soldier HP > 80%, DEF increases by Z%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 10, Inquisitor Level 5

soldiers.name: Exorcist
soldiers.effect: When battling against Demons, ATK increases by 10%(→30%). When battling against non-Demons, DEF increases by 10%(→30%).

trainingSkill.name: Exorcist
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. When battling against Demons, ATK increases by Y%. When battling units other than Demons, DEF increases by Z%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 10, Monk Level 5

soldiers.name: Zealot
soldiers.effect: When Soldier HP is above 80%, for every equipped buff, Soldier ATK/DEF/MDEF increases by 5%(→15%) (up to 15%(→45%)).

trainingSkill.name: Zealot
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. When Soldier HP is above 80%, for every equipped buff, Soldier ATK, DEF, MDEF increase by Y% (up to Z%).

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Inquisitor Level 5

soldiers.name: Forest Priest
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero's healing effects increased by 5%(→15%). When hero uses skills on friendly units, 30%(→100%) chance to dispel 1 debuff.

trainingSkill.name: Forest Priest
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero's healing effects +Y%. When hero uses skills on friendly units, gains a Z% chance to dispel 1 debuff.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Clear Impurities Level 1

soldiers.name: Shrine Maiden
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When Soldier HP is 100%, physical damage taken by the hero is decreased by 30%(→75%).

trainingSkill.name: Shrine Maiden
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. When soldiers are at 100% HP, physical damage taken by the hero is reduced by Y%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Pious Faith Level 5

soldiers.name: Holy Knight
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero healing effects increased by 5%(→15%). When Soldier HP > 80%, DEF increases by 10%(→30%). [Ed: Tiaris must unlock this soldier through class advancement.]

trainingSkill.name: Holy Knight
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Hero Healing Effects +Y%. When Soldier HP > 80%, DEF increases by Z%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Overall Survival Level 5

soldiers.name: Redeemer
soldiers.effect: When being attacked in battle, damage taken -20%. When this unit has no debuffs, then prevent one fatal attack, restoring 20% HP. Afterwards, soldier max HP-20%. May only occur once per map.

soldiers.name: Mentor of the Way
soldiers.effect: When attacked, the unit will not receive melee range penalties. Hero's healing effects +15%, soldier DEF+25%. If the hero is Holy class, soldier ATK +30%

soldiers.name: Warlock
soldiers.effect: Basic Mage. Normal attacks deal [MDamage].

soldiers.name: Thaumaturge
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When initiating combat, ATK increases by 10%(→20%).

trainingSkill.name: Thaumaturge
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When attacking, ATK increases by Y%.

Prereq: Advanced ATK Level 5

soldiers.name: Witch
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When Soldier HP is 100%, ATK increases by 10%(→20%). [Ed: This is a flying soldier. Bozel, Feraquea, and Listell/Rachel—on their left paths—have flier mobility while using this soldier (but are still constrained by their Move).]

trainingSkill.name: Witch
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. When Soldier HP is 100%, ATK increases by Y%.

Prereq: Advanced ATK Level 5

soldiers.name: Wizard
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When initiating combat, ATK & MDEF increase by 10%(→30%).

trainingSkill.name: Wizard
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When attacking, ATK & MDEF increase by Y%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 10, Self-Suggestion Level 5

soldiers.name: Crystal Warlock
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. After taking action, restores 10%(→30%) of soldiers' HP. When forced into battle by a physical attack, unit reflects 10%(→30%) of damage received.

trainingSkill.name: Crystal Warlock
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. After taking action, restores Y% of soldiers' HP. When forced into battle by a physical attack, unit reflects Z% of damage received.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Concentration Level 1

soldiers.name: Dark Alchemist
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal magic damage. After taking action, restore 30% of soldier HP. When soldier HP>80%, soldier range +1 and ATK +30%.

soldiers.name: Sorceress
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When Soldier HP is 100%, ATK & MDEF increases by 15%(→45%). [Ed: This is a flying soldier. Bozel, Feraquea, and Rachel—as Arcane Core—have flier mobility while using this soldier (but are still constrained by their Move). Iris, Olivier, Knight of Mystery, Rachel, and Renne must unlock this soldier through class advancement.]

trainingSkill.name: Sorceress
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. When Soldier HP is 100%, ATK & MDEF increase by Y%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Witch Level 5, Magic Void Level 5

soldiers.name: Skeleton Soldier
soldiers.effect: Basic Demon.

soldiers.name: Skeleton Warrior
soldiers.effect: Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0% and when initiating combat, restores 15%(→35%) HP.

trainingSkill.name: Skeleton Warrior
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0%, and when attacking, restores Y% HP.

Prereq: Overall ATK Level 5

soldiers.name: Skeleton Archer
soldiers.effect: Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0% and when initiating combat, restores 15%(→35%) HP.

trainingSkill.name: Skeleton Archer
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0%, and when attacking, restores Y% HP.

Prereq: Advanced Survival Level 5

soldiers.name: Skeleton Knight
soldiers.effect: Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0% and when initiating combat, restores 15%(→45%) HP. When attacked (except by Demons & Holy units), DEF increases by 10%(→30%).

trainingSkill.name: Skeleton Knight
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0%, and when attacking, restores Y% of Soldier HP after the battle. When attacked, DEF increases by Z%. (This skill [Ed: DEF increase] doesn't work on Demons or Holy units.)

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 10, Skeleton Warrior Level 5

soldiers.name: Hellfire Archer
soldiers.effect: Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0% and when initiating combat, restores 15%(→45%) HP. After battle, deals extra damage (5%(→15%) enemy's Max HP). [Ed: Gizarof, Omega, and Zerida must unlock this soldier through class advancement.]

trainingSkill.name: Hellfire Archer
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0%, and when initiating combat, restores Y% of Soldier HP. After battle, deals extra damage (Z% of enemy's Max HP).

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Skeleton Archer Level 5

soldiers.name: Undead Knight
soldiers.effect: Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0% and when initiating combat, restores 15%(→45%) HP. When attacking (except against Demons & Holy units), ATK increases by 10%(→30%).

trainingSkill.name: Undead Knight
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Resurrection: When Soldier HP is 0%, and when attacking, restores Y% of Soldier HP. When attacking units other than Demons & Holy units, ATK increases by Z%.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Armor Contamination Level 5

soldiers.name: Steelmane Werewolf
soldiers.effect: After battle or actions, 7%(→20%) of Soldier HP is restored. When Soldier HP is above 70%, ATK increases by 14%(→40%) when actively attacking, and when attacked, DEF increases by 14%(→40%).

soldiers.name: Spider Demon Elf
soldiers.effect: Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Before attacking, 30%(→75%) to reduce enemy's Mobiliy by 2 and MDEF by 20% for 1 turn.

trainingSkill.name: Spider Demon Elf
trainingSkill.text:
All Stats +X%. Normal attacks deal [MDamage]. Before attacking, Y% to reduce enemy's Mobiliy by 2 and MDEF by 20% for 1 turn.

Prereqs: Holy/Mage/Demon Training Level 12, Dark Power Level 1
